ygData.subject: Re: General advice for soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: Druids...best for soloing with spells such as snare, root, dot, nuke, heal, buffs...They can solo decent out in the open, but not much for dungeons
ygData.messageBody:
Druids...best for soloing with spells such as
snare, root, dot, nuke, heal, buffs...They can solo
decent out in the open, but not much for dungeons
tho.<br><br>Necros...2nd best for soloing (pets n stuff to fight for em
while they pound away with casting, or learn the art of
reverse-kiting*)<br><br>*Kiting - running from the target and releasing a spell
against the creature that does either direct damage or
damage over time then fleeing again before taking a
hit<br><br>*Reverse kiting - Fearing, instead of rooting a so the
creature runs from you while you pound and/or cast. Of
course your pet will be tanking for you. <br><br>There
are other classes, but I hear those to be the
best...Just look around different places for advice and so
on. <br><br><a href=http://everquest.allakhazam.com target=new>http://everquest.allakhazam.com</a> is the
site I always use to find info.
